definitions.definition: A person or thing that raises .
examples: She is a raiser of gerbils.

definitions.definition: A kind of armchair with a standing-up system .
The upright board on the front of a step in a flight of steps.

main_definition: A person or thing that raises .
secondary_definitions: A kind of armchair with a standing-up system .
( architecture ) The upright board on the front of a step in a flight of steps.
